summary: Adds a configurable, cosmetic invisibility to be synced with Sneak or bound to any key.
descriptionHtml:
Invisibility On Demand gives you the ability to become invisible with the push of a button.  This invisibility is cosmetic only, meaning it doesn\'t affect Stealth gameplay at all.

I created this mod because I found that Stealth in Skyrim becomes unrealistic right as it starts to get good.  With perks, muffle, etc., eventually enemies will be oblivious to you crouching right under their noses (literally), which is a huge immersion killer.  Mods that attempt to rebalance Stealth entirely aren\'t my cup of tea, either, as they often make it too underpowered and/or tedious for me.

The mod is intended to simply make you appear invisible when sneaking, making those unrealistic moments a bit more reasonable.  The key binding will default to whatever key you have bound to Sneak, but you can change it to whatever you want.

[b]Requirements[/b]
1.  SkyUI to access the configuration menu
2.  SKSE

[b]Installation[/b]
1.  Install with NMM or download manually and extract the files to your Data folder.
author: Maverick827
